doc.title: Italian PM's transplant confirmed
doc.author: Guardian staff reporter
doc.description: Silvio Berlusconi has had a hair transplant, the doctor who performed the operation confirmed yesterday, adding that the Italian prime minister will win the battle against baldness

main.p: Silvio Berlusconi has had a hair transplant, the doctor who performed the operation confirmed yesterday, adding that the Italian prime minister will win the battle against baldness
After days of speculation sparked by the white bandanna worn by Mr Berlusconi on holiday in Sardinia, Piero Rosati said the results of the operation would show in a couple of months.
"Yes, it was me," he told the Corriere della Sera daily, a day after denying the rumour to another newspaper.
"Nobody can do miracles ... but there will definitely be an improvement," Dr Rosati said, adding that the first hairs should appear "in a month or two".
